responses: Hey, what are you up to? (Namaste, aap kya kar rahe ho?)
Hey there, how's it going? (Namaste, aap kaise ho?)
Hey, how's life treating you? (Zindagi kaisi chal rahi hai?)
Hi, how you doing? (Namaste, aap kaise ho?)
Hello, all good? (Namaste, sab theek hai?)
Yo, what's happening? (Namaste, kya ho raha hai?)
Hey, what's your name? (Namaste, aapka naam kya hai?)
Thanks, buddy! (Dhanyavaad!)
Wow, that's amazing! (Main aashcharya mein hoon!)
I'm totally stunned! (Main hairan hoon!)
I'm super happy, thanks! (Main bahut khush hoon!)
That's amazing! (Adbhut!)
Really appreciate your support! (Bahut achha sahyog!)
You're rocking it! (Aap bahut accha kar rahe ho!)
Bye, have an awesome day! (Alvida! Aapka din zabardast ho!)
Catch you later! (Phir milenge!)
Take care, I'm off now! (Dhyan rakho, main ab jaa raha hoon!)
Hope you have a fantastic day! (Umeed hai tera din shandar ho!)
Have an amazing day, my friend! (Mere dost, tera din accha ho!)
Talk to you later! (Phir baat karenge!)
Bye for now, take it easy! (Alvida, araam se rehna!)
Until next time, take care! (Agli baar milenge, dhyan rakhna!)
See you soon, buddy! (Jaldi milenge, dost!)
Have a great time, catch you later! (Maza kar, phir milenge!)
I'm good, thanks! How about you? (Main theek hoon, dhanyavaad! Tum kaise ho?)
I'm doing awesome, what about you? (Main zabardast hoon, aur tum?)
I'm fantastic, thanks for asking! (Main fantastic hoon, shukriya! Tum?)
I'm awesome! How's life? (Main zabardast hoon! Zindagi kaise hai?)
I'm feeling good, thanks! What's up? (Main accha feel kar raha hoon, dhanyavaad! Kya chal raha hai?)
Everything's great, all good here! (Sab kuch badhiya chal raha hai!)
Today, I'm feeling really wonderful! (Aaj main bahut accha feel kar raha hoon!)
I'm fine, thanks for checking in! (Main theek hoon, dhanyavaad! Tum kaise ho?)
All's good, buddy! (Sab accha hai, dost!)
I'm great, really! (Main bahut accha hoon, yaar!)

patterns: What have you been up to?
How's your day been so far?
responses: Not much, just hanging out here to help! (Bas yahin hoon madad ke liye, tumhara din kaisa tha?)
So, what have you been up to? (Toh, tum kya kar rahe ho?)
Everything's good here, just doing my thing and helping out! (Sab kuch badhiya hai, bas madad kar raha hoon!)
I'm chilling and ready to chat! (Bas aaram se hoon aur baat karne ke liye ready hoon!)
Today has been pretty cool so far! (Aaj ka din kaafi accha raha hai!)
I've been busy, but it's always fun to chat with you! (Thoda busy tha, lekin baat kar ke maza aaya!)
Just taking it easy! (Bas chill kar raha hoon!)
All good here, thanks for checking in! (Sab badhiya hai, shukriya!)
Just wrapping up some work! (Bas thoda kaam nipta raha hoon!)
I'm just chilling, what about you? (Main bas chill kar raha hoon, tum?)
I can't check the weather right now, but maybe try a weather app? (Mausam check nahi kar sakta, par weather app try karo!)
Why not check your local weather update? (Local weather update check karo!)
Looks like it's sunny outside! (Dikhta hai bahar dhoop hai!)
It's a bit cloudy, but I don't see any rain coming! (Thoda baadal hai, par baarish ki ummeed nahi hai!)

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: I can't tell the time, buddy. Check your phone maybe? (Main time nahi dekh sakta, dost. Phone dekh lo!)
Just glance at your clock for the time! (Bas ghadi dekh lo!)

patterns: Aapke features ke baare mein bataiye
responses: Main anuvaad kar sakta hoon, prashnon ka uttar de sakta hoon, aur aapke saath baat kar sakta hoon!

patterns: What do you do every day?
Can you tell me about your daily routine?
How do you spend your day?
What's a normal day like for you?
How do you organize your day?
Do you have a daily routine?
What do you usually do in a day?
Tell me about your typical day.
What's a regular day for you?
How do you plan your day?
What tasks do you do daily?
What time do you start your day?
How do you begin your day?
What do you do when you wake up?
responses: I'm always here to help you out, just like a friend! (Main hamesha yahan hoon madad ke liye, jaise ek dost!)
I spend my day helping out with language practice! (Main din bhar bhaasha practice mein madad karta hoon!)
I might not have a strict routine, but I'm always around when you need me! (Mera routine fixed nahi hai, par main hamesha hoon jab zarurat ho!)
I spend my day answering your questions and learning with you! (Main din bhar tumhare sawaal ke jawab deta hoon!)
My day is all about chatting and sharing info with you! (Mera din sirf tumhare saath baat karne aur info share karne ka hai!)
I don't really sleep, so I'm always here to answer your questions! (Main zyada nahi sota, isliye hamesha ready hoon!)
I spend my day chatting and helping you learn cool stuff! (Main din bhar baat karta hoon aur nayi cheezein sikhata hoon!)
I'm always around to help with whatever you need! (Main hamesha hoon, jitni bhi madad chahiye!)
I’m here all day to lend a hand and guide you! (Main din bhar yahan hoon madad ke liye!)
Every day, I'm here to help you level up your skills! (Har din main tumhari madad karta hoon skills improve karne mein!)
I wake up each day, excited to chat with you! (Har din main uthta hoon, excited to talk with you!)
I'm always busy answering your questions and sharing tips! (Main hamesha busy hoon tumhare sawaalon ke jawab dene mein!)
I might not follow a strict schedule, but I'm always here with the info you need! (Mera routine fixed nahi hai, par main hamesha info ke saath hoon!)
I'm here all day, helping you learn! (Main poora din yahan hoon tumhari madad ke liye!)
I spend most of my time chatting about various topics, from language to random questions! (Main zyada tar tumhari madad karta hoon alag alag topics mein!)
My day revolves around chatting with you and helping you get better at stuff! (Mera din tumhare saath baat karne aur madad karne mein guzarta hai!)
Every day is a fresh chance to chat and share knowledge! (Har din ek naya mauka hai baat karne ka!)

patterns: How can I improve my English?
Can you help me with grammar?
What's the best way to practice speaking?
Can you give me tips on vocabulary?
How do I get better at speaking English?
responses: Keep practicing regularly, just like we chat every day! (Roz practice karte raho, jaise hum baat karte hain!)
I can totally share some cool tips and exercises with you! (Main kuch cool tips aur exercises share kar sakta hoon!)
Chat with native speakers when you can, it'll boost your fluency! (Native logon se baat karo, fluency badhegi!)
Don't forget reading and writing – they really help! (Padhna aur likhna bhi bahut madadgar hain!)

patterns: Do you have any study tips?
How can I study more effectively?
What are some good study habits?
What's the best way to prepare for exams?
How can I remember more effectively?
responses: Try making a study plan and stick to it, buddy! (Ek study plan banao aur usse follow karo!)
Active learning works wonders – summarize and ask questions! (Summarize karo aur questions poocho, yaar!)
Keep revisiting your notes; it really sticks the info! (Notes baar baar padh lo, yaad rahega!)
Don't forget to take breaks, it keeps you fresh! (Break lena mat bhoolna, taro taaza rahoge!)

patterns: Do you have this in stock?
responses: Let me quickly check if we have that item in stock! (Chalo dekhte hain, kya woh item stock mein hai!)
It's priced at $XX. Wanna grab it? (Iski keemat $XX hai. Kya lena hai?)
We have it in a bunch of colors! (Yeh item kai rangon mein milta hai!)
I'll show you some pics of the product! (Main product ke kuch photos dikhata hoon!)

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
Can I pay by credit card?
What are the available payment options?
responses: You can pay by credit card, debit card, or even cash! (Credit, debit, ya cash – koi bhi method chalega!)
Yep, credit card works just fine! (Haan, credit card se pay kar sakte ho!)
We also take PayPal! (PayPal bhi chalta hai!)
Mobile wallet payments? Yep, that's cool too! (Mobile wallet bhi accept karte hain!)

patterns: Where can I find a good restaurant?
Can you recommend a place to eat?
What's a good place for dinner?
Where is the best restaurant around here?
Can you suggest a good cafe?
responses: There's an awesome restaurant just down the street – need directions? (Gali ke neeche ek zabardast restaurant hai, direction chahiye?)
The best dinner spot is just around the corner! (Dinner ke liye best jagah seedha mohalle mein hai!)
You should totally try that new Italian place nearby – it's amazing! (Naya Italian restaurant try karo, bahut badiya hai!)
There's a cool cafe near the park, perfect for a quick snack! (Park ke paas ek accha cafe hai, snack ke liye perfect hai!)

patterns: Can you tell me about the specials?
What's the best dish on the menu?
responses: Our menu's got a bunch of dishes – wanna check out the specials? (Hamare menu mein kai dishes hain, specials dekhna hai?)
Yep, lots of vegetarian options! (Haan, kai veg options milte hain!)
You've got to try the chef's special – it's a must! (Chef ka special pakwan zaroor try karo!)
And hey, there are gluten-free options too! (Gluten-free options bhi hain!)
I can't check the weather, buddy – maybe try a weather app? (Mausam check nahi kar sakta, yaar, weather app try karo!)
Local weather check karo! (Local weather check karo!)
Seems like it might rain later! (Lagta hai baad mein baarish ho sakti hai!)
The rest of the day looks clear, enjoy! (Aaj baaki din mausam saaf hai, enjoy karo!)

patterns: Can you recommend a good place to visit?
How do I get to the park?
Can you help me find a hotel?
responses: There's a restaurant just two blocks away! (Do blocks door ek restaurant hai!)
The park's only a 10-minute walk from here! (Park sirf 10 minute door hai!)
There's a bus stop just down the road, check it out! (Neeche road par ek bus stop hai!)
The closest hotel is just a 5-minute walk away! (5 minute door mein hotel hai!)

patterns: What's the status of the project?
I need your input on this task.
Is there any update on the project?
responses: Let's take a look at the project details – what's the latest update? (Project details dekhte hain, latest update kya hai?)
I'm free for a meeting – what time works for you? (Meeting ke liye free hoon, tumhe kaunsa time sahi lagega?)
I'll catch you up with the update after the meeting! (Meeting ke baad update bhejunga!)
I've jotted down the task and will share feedback soon! (Task note kar liya, jald feedback doonga!)

patterns: What do you think about this?
Can you provide me with feedback?
responses: Sure, I'd love to check it out – send me the details! (Bilkul, details bhejo!)
It looks pretty good to me – any particular concerns? (Mujhe accha lag raha hai, koi specific problem hai?)
Maybe focus on the main points and clear up the details a bit! (Main ke points pe dhyaan do, details clear karo!)
Your work is awesome – maybe just tweak a few parts! (Tumhara kaam awesome hai, thoda tweak kar sakte ho!)

patterns: What did you have for dinner?
What did you eat for lunch?
What are you eating right now?
What did you have for lunch?
What do you like to eat?
What do you usually eat for breakfast?
Are you in the mood for something sweet?
Have you tried anything new today?
What do you want for dinner?
What should I eat for lunch?
What's the best food you've ever had?
responses: I don't really eat, but I can totally recommend some yummy food options! (Main khata nahi, par yummy options recommend kar sakta hoon!)
Hope you loved your meal! (Umeed hai khana mazedaar tha!)
I don't eat, but you should definitely try some pizza today! (Main khata nahi, par aaj pizza try karo!)
If I could eat, I'd go for some sushi right now! (Agar kha sakta, toh sushi leta!)
Desserts? Always a great idea! (Desserts hamesha badiya hota hai!)
Maybe try a salad – it's healthy and tasty! (Salad try karo, healthy hai aur tasty bhi!)
How about having some pasta for dinner? (Dinner ke liye pasta try karo!)
For lunch, a sandwich might just do the trick – quick and easy! (Lunch ke liye sandwich sahi rahega, quick aur easy!)

patterns: Have you seen any good movies lately?
What's the best movie you've ever seen?
What's the latest movie you watched?
Do you prefer watching movies at home or in theaters?
Have you watched any new movies recently?
Any good horror movies to watch?
Have you seen any good documentaries?
responses: I don't watch movies much, but I can definitely suggest some fun ones! (Main zyada movies nahi dekhta, par fun movies recommend kar sakta hoon!)
You gotta check out 'Inception' – it's mind-blowing! (Inception dekhna, mind-blowing hai!)
Maybe 'The Dark Knight' is your thing – it's a classic! (The Dark Knight, classic hai!)
Comedy movies rock – have you seen 'The Hangover'? (Comedy movies mazedaar hain, 'The Hangover' dekha hai?)
In a thriller mood? 'Gone Girl' is a great pick! (Thriller mood mein ho? 'Gone Girl' try karo!)
If you're into romance, 'The Notebook' is a must-watch! (Romance pasand hai? 'The Notebook' dekho!)
For sci-fi fans, 'Interstellar' is an awesome choice! (Sci-fi ho toh 'Interstellar' badiya hai!)
If you're into action, 'Mad Max' is packed with surprises! (Action pasand hai? 'Mad Max' try karo!)

patterns: Are you going for a walk?
Are you going out with friends?
Do you prefer staying inside or going out?
Is it a good day to go outside?
responses: I usually don't go out much, but I hope you have a fun day out! (Main bahar kam jaata hoon, par ummeed hai din mazedaar hoga!)
Taking a walk outside is always refreshing! (Bahar walk lena hamesha refreshing hota hai!)
The weather's nice today – perfect for going out! (Aaj mausam accha hai, bahar jaane ke liye perfect hai!)
Wish I could join you outside! (Kaash main bhi bahar aa sakta!)
It's sunny out – a perfect day for a stroll! (Bahar dhoop hai, walk ke liye perfect!)
Enjoy the fresh air if you're heading out for a walk! (Walk pe ja rahe ho, taaza hawa ka maza lo!)
Hope you're having a blast outside! (Umeed hai bahar maza aa raha hai!)

patterns: What are you doing right now?
What are you focusing on today?
How are you spending your day?
What's the most important thing you're doing right now?
What do you have planned for today?
Are you preparing for something special?
responses: I'm always around, just a message away! (Main hamesha yahin hoon, bas message karo!)
I'm here to help, just like a friend – what do you need today? (Main yahin hoon madad ke liye, dost, kya chahiye?)
Right now, we're just chatting and having a good time! (Abhi hum bas baat kar rahe hain aur maza kar rahe hain!)
I'm all ears – what do you need help with today? (Main sun raha hoon, batao kya chahiye?)
Got questions? I'm here to answer them! (Sawaal hain? Main hoon jawab dene ke liye!)
Always ready to help, buddy! (Hamesha ready hoon, dost!)

patterns: What's the best sport to play?
responses: I don't play much, but cricket is super exciting! (Main zyada khelta nahi, par cricket zabardast hai!)
Football's always a hit, right? (Football hamesha sabko pasand hai!)
Basketball is awesome if you're into fast-paced action! (Basketball zabardast hai agar fast action pasand ho!)
Tennis is cool to watch, don’t you think? (Tennis dekhne layak hai, hai na?)
If you're into teamwork, soccer might just be your game! (Agar teamwork pasand ho, toh soccer try karo!)

patterns: Can you recommend a good gadget?
What's the best smartphone right now?
Do you prefer iOS or Android?
responses: AI is moving fast these days, it's wild! (AI aajkal tez badh raha hai, badiya hai!)
I'm not big on gadgets, but smartphones are seriously cool! (Main gadgets kam use karta hoon, par smartphones awesome hain!)
Trello and other productivity apps are super handy! (Trello aur productivity apps badiya hain!)
If you're into tech, check out smart home devices – they're cool! (Tech ho toh smart home devices dekh lo!)
Both Android and iOS have their own cool features! (Android aur iOS, dono ke alag features hain!)

patterns: Do you have any inspirational quotes?
Can you share a motivational thought?
responses: Believe in yourself, buddy! (Khud par vishwas karo, dost!)
Success comes from hard work and a never-give-up attitude! (Safalta mehnat aur himmat se aati hai!)
Every day is a fresh chance to grow, so go for it! (Har din naya mauka hai, use grab karo!)
Keep moving forward – you're doing awesome! (Aage badhte raho, tum zabardast ho!)
Don't stop until you're really proud of yourself! (Tab tak mat ruko jab tak khud par garv na ho!)
